ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Wish list...
ygData.msgSnippet: Talies is trying to tread lightly, since he/she (sorry, I have no idea which..heh) wants to join the guild.  :)  Maybe it is worth that much, but he/she may
ygData.messageBody:
Talies is trying to tread lightly, since he/she (sorry, I have no idea
which..heh) wants to join the guild. :) Maybe it is worth that much, but
he/she may come across as a greedy lewt...(you know)...if he/she starts
asking for all that stuff.

Maybe, Talies, if you post a message on their message board, stating your
desire to join the guild, list a few of the things you'd like to have, and
ask for suggestions on what they think they'd be willing to give for it?
For all you know, they have a Plane/Dragon raid coming up soon, and would
love to default a <insert phat lewt here> to you in exchange.

Basically, I'd get their input. :)

Some people have all the luck... heh

At

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
Sent: Monday, July 02, 2001 11:27 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Wish list...



/e Bonks Talies on the head!
white dragonscale
or
Singing steel BP
or
Harmonic dagger and sionachi (both)
or
Breath of Harmony
or
Drums of the beast/lute of the howler/selos drum
*** AND ***
-- Immediate entrance to the guild
(Exceptions like this happen more often than you think)

. Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...> wrote:
I know - it's freaky, don't know how it happened, but I also don't want to
take advantage of the guild, seeing as I want to join when I reach 30th
(minimum requirement for me to join).

Is the Lute of the Howler tradeable? I thought it was nodrop...
hrm - I see that it is not.

How about this - request the Lute of the Howler (what's the worst he can
say? No?), and the ancient coins from Kaesora, Dalnir and City of
Mist? I've already got a bloodgill coin, and I see that the others are not
too hard. That would get me two out of four really good instruments, not
bad for a young bard...

Talies the Wanderer
